document_name: Final report UPR project 28 March 2013 finalized.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The project aims at using the potential of UN Universal Periodic Review (UPR) for Ukraine, Russia, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan to uphold human rights agendas, and advocate lasting change through building relevant capacities of the CSO and media communities in conditions of challenging political environments

project_descr: Leveraging change through the Universal Periodic Review (UPR): supporting CSOs and journalist communities in human rights advocacy efforts
project_title: Leveraging change through the Universal Periodic Review
